mcavatar.description: プレイヤーのMinecraftアバターを表示します。

mcbody.description: プレイヤーのMinecraftのボディーを表示します。

mchead.description: プレイヤーのMinecraftヘッドを表示します。

mcskin.description: プレイヤーの Minecraft のスキンを表示します。

mcquery.description: Minecraftサーバーのインフォを表示します。
mcquery.serverOffline: the server `{{0}}` has been offline in this moment or doesn't exist.

hug.huged: {{0}} gave a very nice hug in {{1}}
hug.description: 友達を抱きしめて、幸せにしてるの。

pat.pated: {{0}} が {{1}} をなでしました
pat.description: なで、なで、なでお願いします。友達をなでくれ。

poke.poked: {{0}} が {{1}} つついだしました
poke.description: サーバーに誰かをつついます。

slap.slaped: {{0}} が {{1}} をぱんぱんしました。

tickle.tickle: {{0}} が {{1}} をくすぐりました。
tickle.description: Ha ha ha ha it tickles. Tickle someone on your server.

reload.argsNull: 利用可能なオプション : {{list}}

kiss.unable: 自分をキスはできないだよ!

anime.invalidAnime: enter the name of the desired anime
anime.animeNotFound: I didn't find any anime with the name like: `{{0}}`.

manga.mangaNotFound: I didn't find any manga with the name matching `{{0}}`.

pay.valueMismatch: you must enter a valid value
pay.poorUser: you don't have enough Yens to complete this payment
pay.confirm: {{user}} is going to receive __`{{yens}}`__ Yens, taxed in **`{{fee}}%`** of the total value ({{total}}). Do you want to proceed?

congaparrot.maxAllowed: for client-side reasons you're allowed to send up to 20 parrots

addemoji.description: Adds an emoji to your server
addemoji.error: something bad happened while I tried to add your emoji. Check the URL and also check if its file format is either png, jpg, jpeg or gif.

addrole.description: ギルドメンバーにロールを追加
addrole.roleNotFound: I couldn't find any role matching {{name}}
addrole.higher: I couldn't add this role because it is, probably, above my highest one. Check the roles and try again.

setnick.description: Sets the nickname of a member
setnick.error: I couldn't set the nickname of this member. Make sure they aren't the guild owner and try again

chat.description: Locks the chat, updating the `Send Messages` permissions for the `@everyone` role
chat.locked: わかったよ、チャネルロックする!
chat.unlocked: わかったよ、チャネルアンロックする！

clear.description: Clears messages in this channel. If specified a user, it clears messages from that user
clear.limit: I can't delete more than a hundred messages
clear.nan: invalid value. Is your argument a number?

kick.description: Kicks an user from the server
kick.selfKick: you can't kick yourself! You might want to lave the guild?
kick.ownerKick: uh... you can't really kick the owner of the guild...
kick.error: I couldn't kick this user. Perhaps their roles are higher than mine. Check the roles and try again

ban.description: Bans an user from the server
ban.ownerBan: uh... you can't really ban the owner of the guild
ban.error: I couldn't ban this user. Perhaps their roles are higher than mine. Check the roles and try again

language.message:
What is the new language? React below.

🇧🇷 Português (Brasil) (Brazilian Portuguese)
🇺🇸 English (United States) (Inglês)
language.description: Changes the language of the guild. Skips the embed if the language is provided, as described in the usage

prefix.success: got it! The new prefix is now `{{prefix}}`
prefix.description: ボットのプレフィックスを変更します
prefix.length: プレフィックスのサイズは 3 文字に制限されています

setbanner.description: Sets the banner of your server. Command available only for server with the "Banner" feature enabled
setbanner.success: Whoa! Your server has now a new banner
setbanner.missingFeature: your server does not have the `Banner` feature, you can't execute this command

aboutme.success: awesome! Your new bio is set as: `{{bio}}`
aboutme.bioLimit: your bio description can have up to 128 characters

softban.description: Soft bans a user. If `purge-days` ends unspecified, the default value (7) will be used.
softban.owner: you can't soft ban the server owner!
softban.error:
I couldn't soft ban this user. Perhaps their roles are higher than my highest one or they are unbannable
For more information: `{{error}}`

choose.description: ボットが何かを選択するようにします

avatar.download: ダウンロードするには[こちら]({{link}})をクリック

calculate.invalidArgs: 有効な値を入力してください。
